turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I'd like to make a coffee order for your Starbucks, please!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, did you have a particular size of drink in mind when calling us today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Tall, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What temperature would you like the drink to be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any additions?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I have low blood-sugar so plenty of sugar please!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course! Any foam today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, plenty of it. Can I get it half foam?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds delicious, of course! What flavor would you like the other half?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Chocolate.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any particular kind of of milk you need?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Almond milk, please. I'm vegan.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any drizzle today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: More chocolate!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, is it a latte?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, how'd you know? Oh, and no fat please!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It just sounded like one delicious latte to me! Anything else today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I'm good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect! Your order will be ready at 19 W Bridge St Unit 101, Dublin Ohio.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wow. Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anytime! I am sending you a text confirmation about your order time now. Have a great coffee day!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You too!
